text: Cory Robert Paus (born April 4, 1980) is a former Canadian football quarterback in the Canadian Football League (CFL). He played college football at UCLA.Paus Claws His Way to the Top He played one year in the CFL for the Calgary Stampeders. His brother, Casey Paus, played quarterback at the University of Washington.L-Way Quarterbacks Take Time to 'Paus' and Reflect on Careers ==References== ==External links== *UCLA Bruins bio *Just Sports Stats Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:People from Hinsdale, Illinois Category:Players of American football from Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Cook County, Illinois Category:Sportspeople from DuPage County, Illinois Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Canadian football quarterbacks Category:UCLA Bruins football players Category:Calgary Stampeders players
title: Cory Paus
